entry.title: Baba Ramdev a fraud?
entry.content:
Baba Ramdev

There is a Yogi in India who is called as Ramdev. He is advocate of how things Indian are superior to those of the west. He portrays himself as the savior of Indians from western influence and products.

He promotes yoga and has got a product line called Patanjali which produces FMCG products so that Indian’s don’t buy western brands. All good, but what happens when Ramdev falls sick? Even though he calls himself a Yogi and promotes Indian stuff, when there is a real issue with his health, he runs abroad for treatment says gossip. What a shame on him!

Its not just him, late M.G.Ramachandran, an actor and ex-chief-minister of Tamilnadu had a famous song line in one of his movies that say “Whats not there in this divine nation (India), why should we stretch our hands to foreign nations?”. Yet when he had a major illness with his Kidney what did he do? He ran to USA to get a treatment.

I can only pity the people of India, how stupid they are and how they start to believe people who are in lime light so easy, and how they forget and forgive what the famous say and give in to sentiments.
C.N.Annadurai

It should also be noted that another leader in India, C.N.Annadurai was critical of Tamils ignorance. He never boasted about Indian superiority over the West, at the same time he never said the West are superior to us. He acknowledged reality that West was highly developed compared to us and advocated close partnership. He got treatment for his cancer from USA and that’s okay.

Annadurai once said, when asked a Tamilian “whats the capital of USA?”, a Tamil would not know the answer, but when asked “whats the vehicle of Yamadharamn?”, “its buffalo” a Tamil would say without hesitation.

Will the people of my nation become more intelligent?

entry.title: Iyappan and Strange Hinduism
entry.content:
![](https://thishollowearth.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/ayyappa.jpg)
Its quiet strange what has been happening in Hinduism for centuries. Like many cultures around the world, here in India, women are deprived of many rights, though they are slowly getting it back. I am happy that the supreme court has given a verdict that women can go into Iyappan temple. For centuries women have been kept out.
For some reason the God Iyappa there seems not to like women who are menstruating for some reason. No wonder he was born in an era that was relatively unscientific compared to what it is today and possibly menstruation was considered a taboo. Today in the age of science we know that's not the case and its a natural process. So women are not less to men because they menstruate and hence they can be allowed in the temple says the court.
But still Hinduism seems strange to me. Pilliyar and Hanumaan are are both unmarried and symbolized bhramachariyam (the art of not getting intoxicated and seduced by women), yet its not bad for women to worship them, go to their temples, touch their pictures and idols. Its only in Iyappan temple we see all these fuss. That's strange.
Now that the court has given equal rights to women, I wonder what is going to happen next. We have the fanatic RSS which is supported by the ruling BJP, and many ordinary Hindus do not welcome this verdict. Will families send their women of age to Iyappan temple? None knows. Even if women of age do go to the temple, will they be safe? Wont the fanatics try to harass them, some cases insult and kill them? No one knows.
One day Indian public will be mature. They will look upon women been banned from going to Iyappan as idiotic as women been forced to commit sathi, but till the mentality changes anything tragic fueled by Hindu fanatics could happen. That too today these fanatics are immune to law and order. Lets see....

entry.title: The dark side of Fantastic Jeyachandran

link.title: The dark side of Fantastic Jeyachandran

entry.content:
{% youtube n2z-8oLPOWY %}
Jeyachandran invests crores to put ads on T.V about its new showroom in Pallikaranai, and its a grand showroom. I drive past it every day and I drive back late at night everyday.
Though Jeyachandran looks good on the outside and invests a lot of money in marketing, there is a dark side of it. This company seems to have no social consciousness.
For this fantastic Jeyachandran, sales are booming, and at night crowds arrive in large numbers, and their vehicles cause a huge traffic jam. Jeyachandran could ease it but they are doing nothing about it.
There are two main ways Jeyachandran could do it. First, Jeyachandran has 100's of people working with it, just by putting 2 people to control traffic will make a difference, now the junction is chaotic and traffic queues upto a Kilometer and none does anything about it.
The second thing Jeyachandran could do is to clear off some of its bike parking at its space near the roads so that there will be more road width, thus easing up the traffic flow.
But this thing is going on for sometime and Jeyachandran seems not to care. My humble request to people, yes you might be drawn by the low price, but try avoiding Jeyachandran if its possible as they seem to have no society consciousness till now.

entry.title: How Telephone Companies Loot You
entry.content:
![](http://images.jagran.com/bsnl_logo_090614.jpg)
I had to surrender one of my BSNL number, I went to Velacherry BSNL office, and damn, those sight of government servants. Definitely that office was unhelpful, you don't know which counter is for what. I went to a lady clerk, and she keyed in my number on her terminal and found out that my bills were pending, well I haven't used my phone for months. If I hadn't used it for 5 months, why can't they cut my line when I did not pay the bill for the first month? Duh!!!
Instead they were charging me for the phone as though i was using it. Damn. When I pulled out my purse that lady said she can't take money and close my account. What? Bloody hell I am in BSNL office and I can't pay BSNL bill!!!?
I have to pay the bill online, then go to a place to surrender my number, then I need to write a snail mail to their account department to refund the money I had paid as deposit. Damn.
All mobile companies charge you even if you stop paying a months bill. Vodafone is crap, my friend got number and he stopped paying because he did not want that number, he got another Vodafone number. Vodafone identified him with his aadhar card and stopped their service for other number too, thus forcing him to pay for the first one. Damn. Don't ever get a Vodafone service.
Can't there be a rule that if you stop paying for a month your number will be terminated, and that's it. Why its so easy to get a new connection and so difficult to terminate it? Have you ever thought of it? Because they want to loot you. Its as simple as that.
Do you really know its possible for people in cities to communicate without the need of mobile carriers, and it will be far far cheaper, and have you wondered why the government is not allowing that by law?
We are just a bunch of slaves, that's it, a bunch of slaves and fools that mobile companies and governments could loot.

entry.title: Another admission of defeat for Windows

link.title: Another admission of defeat for Windows

entry.content:
![](https://cdn.wallpapersafari.com/38/59/PYHvQk.jpg)
Windows is slowly but surely giving way to GNU Linux. Linux's desktop share is just above 2%, but on the Internet scale GNU Linux rules. All computers that power our Internet are critical systems and they run Linux. Most mobile phones use Linux as Android. Many people who use Amndroid never know they are Linux users and they vocally oppose using Linux on their desktops!?
But Microsoft is not as foolish as the people who use its OS. Looks like many engineers on the M$ know that defeat of Windows is imminent, and they are giving their way slowly ao that it would not look like a humiliating defeat.
First is M$'s Azure. It offers Linux on its servers, and I bet there are more Azure instances that run Linux than Windows. Recently I had a problem with Windows. In my office we use Python as we are a data science company, one of my coworker had a problem in running a flask app. It worked perfectly on my system which was and Ubuntu.
After a little bit investigation it was evident the way that the way Windows OS functioned was a problem. I had an irrational resistance for installing GNU Linux on her computer, but it was clear the resistance was irrational. There is a way to combat irrationality, let the irrational people finish stuff. Work stopped and fortunately for me, the person realized loss in productivity and it was the only the way to go ahead, so I installed GNU Lubuntu.
I just wondered if Windows was such a crap system, why are developers using it? Are CTO's around the world gone nuts? Haven't they seen such a problem? But then to my amazement, I found that Windows 10 now allows Linux subsystem to be installed in it! Its not as good as full GNU Linux at your disposal, but rather than fighting the free software community, M$ has recognized Linux which once it famously called as the toy OS.
Like a Spartan phalanx Linux is advancing, though M$ is doing all it can to stop Linux, it seems not enough. As more and more developers pour in to develop Linux during their free time, M$ simply does not have the budget to win such a war, and they know it really well.
Many economic theorist will be confused to know that a capitalistic organization is bowing to a communal force thats not interested in making a buck. Well, we don't know if the Universe is infinite, but we are sure that human stupidity is.

[Install the Windows Subsystem for Linux](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install-win10)
